= Introduction =

*MiiGame* is a Wii games manager such as WBFS Manager. It can help you to manage the Wii game disk to USB storage. It support ISO, RAR, ZIP or 7z type. Of course, this program is just started, so now it only supports ISO format.

= About Me =

Writing programs is my interest and habit.
